Applicants must 

- Be an undergraduate student at the time of the institute. 
- Be US citizen or permanent resident
- Have knowledge of and interest in computing, probability, calculus, and linear algebra. These prerequisites are flexible. 
- Have interest in scientific questions
- GPA???

## Requirements for the 2022 program

Participants will be required to follow COVID-19 related regulations of the University of California Irvine, including proof of vaccination. 


## Application Form 

Applicants will be asked to submit the following along with their application form.

- A personal statement of interest
- Unofficial college transcripts
- A letter of recommendation
